3b16c367a829f28192f2d4d7509057fef73b72bf.commit.message: DELTASPIKE-175 cleanup and fixed dispose of @TransactionScoped beans

f9becf71d787196103352bae94a955567d5ac2bc.commit.message:
DELTASPIKE-175 fix NPE on Weld

It seems that in Weld we don't get an empty array but null.
This might be caused by a different AnnotatedType implementation.
f9becf71d787196103352bae94a955567d5ac2bc.commit.author.name: Mark Struberg

94327565d2c558185b71473a14786e11dc26c0b6.commit.message:
DELTASPIKE-185 DELTASPIKE-175 @Transactional interceptor cleanup

This commit simplifies the whole structure and removes the handling
of @PersistenceContext. We must not touch those as this would leed
to Exceptions on EE servers.
94327565d2c558185b71473a14786e11dc26c0b6.commit.author.name: Mark Struberg

bcb8710ef9250f43c2996d30ae1b141657717a79.commit.message:
DELTASPIKE-175 DELTASPIKE-178 improve JavaDoc and now unused autoDetect feature

The autodetect flag is not used anymore as this is now the default.
bcb8710ef9250f43c2996d30ae1b141657717a79.commit.author.name: Mark Struberg
